page.title: 14BENGEWORTH CHURCH
page.content: Everybody in Bengeworth is used to seeing the tall church spire with its clock telling us the time. Mr. Banks, our vicar, is a busy man. On Sundays there are two Holy Communion services in the morning and Evensong at half past six. During the week there is one Communion Service. Anyone can go into the church at any time as it is always kept open. Besides taking services the vicar visits people in hospital and in their homes, prepares for the Sunday services and goes to all meetings in the parish. On Saturday mornings there is a Saturday Club for under tens. They sing songs, learn about Jesus, paint pictures and make collages which are hung in the church. Those over ten go to the Saturday Spectacular,although there are only half a dozen members at the present time.
